title: Brothers working at Mass. elementary school both accused of indecent assault on children
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime Police said surveillance camera footage showed the brothers touching students inappropriately near the playground.

By Abby Patkin December 2, 2025 | 11:29 AM 2 minutes to read Two brothers — both educators at an elementary school in Boylston — pleaded not guilty to indecent assault and battery charges Monday after another staff member accused them of inappropriately touching children.

Benjamin Dillman, 26, and his brother Peter Dillman, 24, were arrested Friday after the Boylston Police Department said it received a report of inappropriate behavior involving children at Boylston Elementary School.

title: 3 New Englanders dead in Florida boating incident
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Local News A fourth person remains in critical but stable condition.
Three people died in a Florida boating incident on Saturday, officials said.

Emergency personnel responded to the “incident” involving a 39-foot vessel on the Caloosahatchee River near the Cape Coral Yacht Club that day, the Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission wrote in a statement, providing no additional information on what exactly occurred.

author: Madison Lucchesi

title: Pair from R.I. arrested after Duxbury armed robbery; police tracked them via stolen Apple Watch
author: Madison Lucchesi
bullets: Crime The man and woman were allegedly involved in a string of robberies on the South Shore on Sunday.
A Rhode Island man is charged in a Duxbury armed robbery that took place Sunday after police tracked him via the Apple Watch he allegedly stole.
A woman who was with him, also from Rhode Island, was arrested as well.
